results.title: Pinecone - Connectors
results.description: Pinecone (Preview) Pinecone makes it easy to provide long-term memory for high-performance AI applications. Pinecone is a managed, cloud-native vector database with no infrastructure hassles. Pinecone serves fresh, filtered query results with low latency at the scale of billions of vectors.  ...ector Metadata Publisher Troy Taylor Website.

results.title: Using the Semantic Kernel Pinecone Vector Store connector (Preview)
results.description: Using the Pinecone connector (Preview) Warning The Pinecone Vector Store functionality is in preview, and improvements that require breaking changes may still occur in limited circumstances before release.
